}","poolAddress":"The pool address associated with this offset request"}}},"title":"HbarOffset","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"getBalance()":{"notice":"Helper to read contract balance (HBAR)."},"requestOffset(string,uint256,address)":{"notice":"User sends HBAR and metadata describing their offset request."},"sweep(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sweep HBAR from the contract to Typically called by your backend / ops wallet."}},"notice":"Users send HBAR with metadata describing what they want to offset.
